result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

chargeModifiers.descr: PTAC, as a Party to a Crime

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Pamela A Greer

records.addlTxt: 1:09 PM Defendant Pamela A Greer in court.  Attorney Jason Matthew Lockery in court for Pamela A Greer.  Prosecuting attorney Margaret Delain in court for the State of Wisconsin. Rec'd copy of INFO/waived reading. Enter Pleas of Not Guilty, Court enters Not Guilty Plea, set for trial.  Bond continues.

1:39 PM Defendant Pamela A Greer not in court.  Attorney Jason Matthew Lockery in court for Pamela A Greer.  Prosecuting attorney Margaret Delain in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Atty Lockery advises DE contacted him and advised she had medical issues and requests a reset or DE be allowed to appear by phone.  Based on non-appearance, court authorized warrant but stays until October 25, 2022, at 1:00 p.m.  Matter reset.
Arraignment scheduled for October 25, 2022 at 01:00 pm.

11:10 a.m. Prosecuting attorney Rick C Spoentgen in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Pamela A Greer in court.  Attorney Jason Matthew Lockery in court for Pamela A Greer.  Court states case and appearances.  Atty Lockery states the DE will waive her right to prelim today.  DE agrees.  Court questions DE on prelim waiver/accepts/finds probable cause/binds DE over.  Atty Lockery requests ARGN be set out.  Bond continued.
Arraignment scheduled for October 20, 2022 at 01:00 pm.

3:00 PM Prosecuting attorney Gabriel David Arevalo in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Pamela A Greer in court.  Attorney Jason Matthew Lockery in court for Pamela A Greer.  Court states case and appearances and quashes the warrant.  Atty Lockery explains nonappearance by DE last week.  Requests signature bond be reinstated.  Status of case is unknown as Atty Lockery was just recently appointed.  He's requesting a PTC date w/the DA.  State won't object to the bond being reinstated.  Bond reinstated along w/any conditions.
Pre-trial conference scheduled for July 15, 2022 at 11:30 am.
Preliminary hearing scheduled for August 18, 2022 at 10:30 am.
Preliminary hearing on August 18, 2022 at 10:30 am.
Pre-trial conference on July 15, 2022 at 11:30 am.
Return on warrant on June 15, 2022 at 02:30 pm.

1:17 PM Prosecuting attorney Natalia J Gess in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Pamela A Greer not in court.  Attorney Jason Matthew Lockery in court for Pamela A Greer.  Atty Lockery has no record to make.  State requests warrant.  Based on non-appearance, court authorized warrant.
